text: The <extra_id_0> Flag-IKKbeta (SSEE) <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> Flag-IKKbeta (SSAA) <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and <extra_id_0> HA-IkappaBalpha (SSAA) <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> constructs were provided by C . Wu ( NCI , Bethesda ) and U . Siebenlist ( NIAID , Bethesda ) , respectively .
The <extra_id_0> HA-IkappaBalpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IKKbeta (K44A)-Flag <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> plasmids were purchased from Addgene44 , 45 .

The <extra_id_0> Flag-RPS3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> GST-RPS3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> HA-RPS3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> VN-HA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> NleH1-HA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> plasmids were described previously6 , 9 .

The point mutants of <extra_id_0> RPS3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> were generated by site - directed mutagenesis using the Quick Change Kit ( Stratagene ) with primers forward 5'-CTGCCTGACCACGTGGCCATTGTGGAACCCAAA-3 ' and reverse 5'-TTTGGGTTCCACAATGGCCACGTGGTCAGGCAG-3 ' for S209A .
All mutants were verified by DNA sequencing .
